## Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read data
```{r}
trawlm <- read.csv(file.path(dataPath,"removed_observations.csv"), sep ="|")
trawlm <- trawlm %>% separate(col=clean_taxonomy, into = c("observation_main", "observation_modifier"), sep =";") %>%
  filter(observation_main == "trawl mark")
```
